modName: Revealing Blacksmith Apron - male - Acer edition
summary: Lite version of Blacksmith\'s Apron for males
descriptionHtml:
Revealing Blacksmith Apron - male - Acer edition

Lite version of Blacksmith\'s Apron for males

[img]http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/images/29200-1-1323630915.png[/img]
These files contain adult-only content!


Requirements:
[url=file.php?id=3421]Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male[/url] v1.5 or higher by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1630086]Sundracon[/url]


Knowing Bugs:
- the right thigh bug for some blacksmith\'s animations
- the butt bug while jumping - but blacksmiths don\'t jump, anyway.
- the manhood bug for all lazy blacksmiths


Credits:
Bethesda Softworks
